item.title: Finding good bets in the lottery, and why you shouldn't take them
item.description: arXiv:2507.01993v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: We give a criterion under which the expected return on a ticket for certain large lotteries is positive. In this circumstance, we use elementary portfolio analysis to show that an optimal investment strategy includes a very small allocation for such tickets.
item.arxiv:journal_reference: American Mathematical Monthly, vol. 117 no. 1 (2010), pp. 3-26
item.dc:creator: Aaron Abrams, Skip Garibaldi
